remarks:
Given falsum ` F. ` , we can define the negation of a wff ` ph ` as the statement that ` F. ` follows from assuming ` ph ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Jul-2019.) 

---

 Given falsum, we can define the negation of a wff ` ph ` as the statement that a contradiction follows from assuming ` ph ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Feb-2017.)  (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 21-Jul-2019.)
